keyphrase: Transition from one phase to another
summary: Life involves moving from one stage to the next, often bringing mixed emotions of joy and nostalgia.
Significant life events mark the end of one chapter and the beginning of another, requiring adaptation and acceptance.
Reaching a milestone is a time to reflect on past experiences and celebrate personal growth and success.
Looking back on enjoyable experiences can evoke a sense of longing and appreciation for what has been.
While endings can be bittersweet, they also open the door to new opportunities and possibilities.
